âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ WebRTC for low latency peer-to-peer connections â€¢ WebSocket implemented in golang for WebRTC signaling â€¢ Screen sharing directly via browser â€¢ No installation or registration required
ðŸ“– Summary: Laplace enables screen sharing via browser using WebRTC for low-latency peer-to-peer connections and a Go-based WebSocket for signaling. It avoids the need for installations or registrations, minimizing server costs by performing encoding and transmission on the client side. This is useful for game streaming, collaborative work, and presentations.
